com.github.dmitry_mingazov.connect_four

Interface Player

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BotPlayer, InteractivePlayer

    public interface Player
    Player of game, it has a Disc and can be automated, using different strategies, or interactive

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Disc getDisc()
      Get player's disc
      boolean isBot()
      Check if the player is real or is automated
      int selectColumn(Board board, Disc opponentDisc)
      If the player is automated and has a BotStrategy, choose a move
      void setStrategy(BotStrategy strategy)
      Set the BotStrategy the automated player will play on

    • Method Detail

      • getDisc

        Disc getDisc()
        Get player's disc
        Returns:
        player's Disc

      • isBot

        boolean isBot()
        Check if the player is real or is automated
        Returns:
        true if the player is automated, false otherwise

      • selectColumn

        int selectColumn(Board board,
                 Disc opponentDisc)
          throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        If the player is automated and has a BotStrategy, choose a move
        Parameters:
        board - Board where the game is played
        opponentDisc - Disc owned by opponent
        Returns:
        column where the disc would be placed
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if there are not BotStrategy loaded

      • setStrategy

        void setStrategy(BotStrategy strategy)
        Set the BotStrategy the automated player will play on
        Parameters:
        strategy - BotStrategy the player will use
